name: ecomm-microservices
description: Practice Node.js microservices monorepo for e-commerce platform
author: Tejas Soni

scripts.bootstrap: pnpm install && pnpm run docker:up && pnpm run migrate:all && pnpm run seed:all
scripts.dev: concurrently -n users,products,orders,payments,notifications "pnpm --filter users dev" "pnpm --filter products dev" "pnpm --filter orders dev" "pnpm --filter payments dev" "pnpm --filter notifications dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n users,products,orders,payments,notifications "pnpm --filter users start" "pnpm --filter products start" "pnpm --filter orders start" "pnpm --filter payments start" "pnpm --filter notifications start"
